channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 01:20 Air alarm to Kryvyi Rih District Surveat for Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 01:20 Air alarm to Kryvyi Rih District Surveat for Further Messages.#Kryvyi Rih Ri This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 01:12 Dumping anxiety in the Cherkasy region. Find out, anxiety is still in:- Zvenigorod district- Cherkasy district- Zolotonsky district
item.description: 游리 01:12 Dumping anxiety in the Cherkasy region. Find out, anxiety is still in:- Zvenigorod district- Cherkasy district- Zolotonsky district#Cherkasy_ This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
